snippet.title: Nadir Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo of Nadir here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1535100/Nadir/

Nadir is a roguelike adventure influenced by Dante's Divine Comedy. Face powerful demons, build your deck, and progress the Seven Deadly Sins as they cut their way through Hell. But there’s a catch: you must plan both your and the enemy's moves, for every action you take feeds your opponent.

#nadir #blackeyegames #deckbuilding  #deckbuilder
